title: Factory Payrolls, Chemicals for United States
notes:
Chemicals And Allied Products, In Source. Series 08217 Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1920-1942 (2)--Original Data, 1947-1954. Source: Derived By Multiplying Employment (See B.C., Series 8,216) With Average Weekly Earnings, See Bureau Of Labor Statistics, Employment, Hours, And Earnings, Manufacturing Division, Nondurable Goods Subdivision, Chemicals And Allied Products, Releases Ls53-2660 (2-53) And (4-53) Through 1952; Monthly Labor Review, Thereafter.

This NBER data series m08217b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: m08217b
